title: Japan’s Stocks Climb on Weak Yen, Election Expectation Tailwinds
description: Japanese shares opened higher after a three-day weekend as rising expectations for a domestic snap election reignited the so-called Takaichi trade and a weaker yen boosted exporters.
content: Japanese shares opened higher after a three-day weekend as rising expectations for a domestic snap election reignited the so-called Takaichi trade and a weaker yen boosted exporters.
